analysis.key_quote: An obvious attempt to make it possible to install more partisan cronies and political loyalists in federal civil service, which will undermine the continuity of service after every election, which will degrade the quality of the federal workforce and its service to the American people.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the negative impact on the quality and continuity of federal service, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
